tokens.resolved_gloss: to fasten upon; hence, to seize, be strong (figuratively, courageous, causatively strengthen, cure, help, repair, fortify), obstinate; to bind, restrain, conquer

tokens.resolved_gloss: literally one officiating, a priest; also (by courtesy) an acting priest (although a layman)

tokens.resolved_gloss: a man as an individual or a male person; often used as an adjunct to a more definite term (and in such cases frequently not expressed in translation)

tokens.resolved_gloss: a circle, i.e. (by implication) a circumjacent tract or region, especially the Ghor or valley of the Jordan; also a (round) loaf; also a talent (or large [round] coin)
